issue.title: [C++] Improve integer parsing performance
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-3321](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-3321). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
According to the `number-parsing-benchmark`, parsing integers from strings currently runs at around ~5M items/sec. (on Ubuntu 18.04). We should be able to do better. This will be important for CSV parsing performance.

comments.body:
***Note**: [Comment](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-3321?focusedCommentId=16627201) by Wes McKinney (wesm):*
Issue resolved by pull request 2619
<https://github.com/apache/arrow/pull/2619>
